channel.title: Help with a multiple Client server application
channel.description: Well I wanna do something that implicates a multiple client-server application and i have no knowledge on networking at all just a few things, I managed to make a basic server with the docs and some info, but the server only responds to one client, also, i dont want it to be a thread-per-client server, can anybody point me to a tutorial or give me useful information? I really want to learn how to do it.
